metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28277 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerabilty exists in jhead 3.04 and 3.05 is affected by: Buffer Overflow via the RemoveUnknownSections function in jpgfile.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28277` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jhead package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.2+esm1').
